sources.title: The Deadly Bees (1966) Excited by the smell of fear, they inflict their fatal stings!
sources.description:
Trouble strikes when an exhausted pop singer, sent on a vacation to a farm, realizes that the farm's owner raises deadly bees.

Original title: The Deadly Bees

Director: Freddie Francis
Writers: Robert Bloch, Anthony Marriott

Main cast:
Suzanna Leigh - Vicki Robbins
Guy Doleman - Ralph Hargrove
Frank Finlay - H.W. Manfred
Catherine Finn - Mary Hargrove

Genres: Horror, Thriller
Release date: December 1966 (UK)
Filming location: England, UK


Availability varies by region
https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL2gsu7VGzgdbtxZGahjOpER2huEhTG9Rb

@CultCinemaClassics

metadata.Plot: Pop singer Vicki Robbins collapses from exhaustion while shooting the 1960s equivalent of a music video, and her physician prescribes a respite on Seagull Island with colleague and beekeeper Ralph Hargrove. Vicki finds the Hargroves' bitter marital strife oddly relaxing. But when a mysterious swarm of specially-bred attack bees starts killing island residents, Vicki fights for her survival, setting fire to nearly half the structures on the island in her escape.
metadata.Writer: Robert Bloch, Anthony Marriott, Gerald Heard
metadata.Actors: Suzanna Leigh, Frank Finlay, Guy Doleman
